response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which is tailored specifically to meet your needs and expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, reflecting its quality and uniqueness. Considering its worth, we propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value of $1,500,000, providing you with an unparalleled chance to own this masterpiece at a highly attractive rate. We believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties, ensuring that you receive a valuable asset while allowing us to achieve our goal of maximizing the product's value. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information.", "product_price": 1200000}
